com.datumbox.common.utilities

Class PHPfunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datumbox.common.utilities.PHPfunctions

  • public class PHPfunctions
extends Object
    This class contains a number of convenience methods which have an API similar to PHP functions and their are implemented in Java.
    Author:
    Vasilis Vryniotis
